Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache

Contains some caching features, based on RAM or/and the SD card (persistence) of the terminal.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Cacher.Instructions Indicates whether the current cached data should be taken from the cache.
Values.CacheableValue<BusinessObjectType,ExceptionType extends Exception,ProblemExceptionType extends Exception> Defines a basic contract which enables to cache a business object in memory, know when it has been cached, and have a dynamic strategy for refreshing the object.
Values.CachingEvent Used when requesting a Values.CacheableValue or a Values.CachedMap for retrieving a business object, depending on the current workflow.
Values.Instructions<BusinessObjectType,ExceptionType extends Exception,ProblemExceptionType extends Exception> Used and required when the business object is not available in memory.
 

Class Summary
Cacher<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends Throwable,InputExceptionType extends Exception> A class which enables to cache business objects.
DbPersistence Enables to store some input streams on a SQLite database.
FilePersistence Enables to store on the internal/external device "hard-drive" and cache in memory some contents.
MemoryCacher<BusinessObjectType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends Exception,InputExceptionType extends Exception> A class which enables to cache the result of web service calls in RAM only.
NullPersistence An implementation of persistence which stores nothing.
Persistence Enables to store persistently on the internal/external device "hard-drive" some contents.
Persistence.UriUsage Defined in order to count how many times an URI has been consumed.
Persistence.UriUsages  
Values Gathers interfaces and classes for handling business objects in cache.
Values.BackedCachedMap<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends Throwable,InputExceptionType extends Exception> Enables to cache in memory and on persistent cache a map of business objects.
Values.BackedCachedValue<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends Throwable,InputExceptionType extends Exception>  
Values.CachedMap<BusinessObjectType,KeyType,ExceptionType extends Exception> Enables to cache in memory a map of business objects.
Values.CachedValue<BusinessObjectType,ExceptionType extends Exception> Enables to cache a business object in memory only.
Values.Caching Defines a common class for all "cacheables", i.e.
Values.Info<BusinessObjectType> Gathers a business object and its time stamp.
Values.MemoryAndCacheInstructions<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends Throwable,InputExceptionType extends Exception>  
Values.MemoryInstructions<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends Throwable,InputExceptionType extends Exception>  
Values.OnlyFromCacheInstructions<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends Throwable,InputExceptionType extends Exception>  
Values.RetentionInstructions<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends Throwable,InputExceptionType extends Exception>  
Values.SessionInstructions<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends Throwable,InputExceptionType extends Exception>  
Values.WithParameterInstructions<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends Throwable,InputExceptionType extends Exception>  
 

Enum Summary
Cacher.Status Defines some common statuses.
Values.Instructions.Result States the result of an assessment.
 

Exception Summary
Values.CacheException  
Values.InstructionsException  
 

Error Summary
Persistence.PersistenceException The exception thrown when an error occurs during a persistence operation.
 

Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache Description

Contains some caching features, based on RAM or/and the SD card (persistence) of the terminal.
